org.bytedeco.javacpp.indexer

Class IntIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.indexer.Indexer
      • org.bytedeco.javacpp.indexer.IntIndexer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    IntArrayIndexer, IntBufferIndexer

    public abstract class IntIndexer
extends Indexer
    Abstract indexer for the int primitive type.
    Author:
    Samuel Audet

      • create

        public static IntIndexer create(IntPointer pointer,
                                int[] sizes,
                                int[] strides,
                                boolean direct)
        Creates a int indexer to access efficiently the data of a pointer.
        Parameters:
        pointer - data to access via a buffer or to copy to an array
        direct - true to use a direct buffer, see Indexer for details
        Returns:
        the new int array backed by a buffer or an array
